dct_title_s: Arabia e Mesopotamia (Djeziret el - 'Arab ve 'Iraq)  / Ufficio cartografico della C.T.I.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. Depths shown by isolines and soundings. Map shows international and provincial boundaries. Toponyms spelling is according to the Royal Geographical Society [London] Includes 2 ancillary maps: Northern part continued   [covers Mesopotamia extending to part of  Iran]  at different scale  1:3,000,0000 -- [Suez Canal and vicinity]  Scale 1:1,500,000. Map shows British and French mandates, and neutral territories. Scale 1:10,000,000, no. 91
dct_publisher_sm: Milano : Touring club italiano. Ufficio cartografico, 1929.
